TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BaseValidatorDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner

summary.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述控制項衍生自抽象類別會剖析，並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 物件為衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援視覺化設計工具中的類別。The objects provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the class in a visual designer. 方法，取得用來呈現關聯的控制項設計階段標記。The method gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. ## Examples 下列範例衍生`SimpleCompareValidator`控制項從類別。The following example derives the `SimpleCompareValidator` control from the class. `SimpleCompareValidator` 是一份。`SimpleCompareValidator` is a copy of the . 此範例也衍生設計工具`SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner`從類別，並使用屬性產生關聯`SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner`類別`SimpleCompareValidator`控制項。The example also derives the designer `SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` from the class and uses the attribute to associate the `SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` class with the `SimpleCompareValidator` control. `SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` 覆寫實心周圍繪製框線方法`SimpleCompareValidator`控制項在設計階段，如果值控制項的屬性是或欄位。`SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` overrides the method to draw a solid border around the `SimpleCompareValidator` control at design time if the value of the property of the control is the or field. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/CS/CustomCompareValidatorDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/VB/customcomparevalidatordesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立關聯的控制項衍生自類別或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果或屬性相關聯控制項衍生自類別為空字串 ("")，或如果屬性設定為 欄位中，方法設定括在括號 ([]) 和集合的控制項 ID 的屬性屬性欄位。If the or property of the associated control that is derived from the class is an empty string (""), or if the property is set to the field, the method sets the property to the control ID, which is enclosed in brackets ([]) and sets the property to the field. 然後呼叫基底方法來產生標記，並還原為其原始值，控制項的屬性，如有必要。The then calls the base method to generate the markup, and restores the control properties to their original values, if necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，在設計階段繪製實心相關聯的控制項框線，如果值控制項的屬性設定為或欄位。The following code example shows how to override the method that draws a solid border around the associated control at design time if the value of the property of the control is set to the or field. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/CS/CustomCompareValidatorDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/VB/customcomparevalidatordesigner.vb#3)]

summary.span: Used by the designer to remove or add properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制設計工具的物件使用的方法，以衍生自遮蔽控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並能將屬性加入到，或從屬性方格中移除屬性的方法。Control designer objects use methods that are derived from the method to shadow control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the properties grid.
